intro: This Product User Manual provides a comprehensive guide to the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) N2K product, which offers detailed Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) information for grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe. Covering the reference years 2006, 2012, and 2018, the product aids in monitoring habitat conservation status and analysing land cover changes within and around these protected areas. It details the product's characteristics, application areas, methodology, quality assessment, and access conditions, focusing on the technical aspects of data acquisition, classification, and validation processes.
keywords: Mapping and Assessment of Ecosystems and their Services typology
ETRS89 Lambert Azimuthal Equal Area projection
